data.comment: The match has started.
Throw-in for Philadelphia in their own half.
In the minute 1, Ball goes out of play for a Cincinnati goal kick.
Philadelphia have a goal kick.
Free kick for Cincinnati in their own half.
In the minute 2, Cincinnati's Joseph-Claude Gyau gets in a shot on goal at Subaru Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Philadelphia have been awarded a corner by Jon Freemon.
Jakob Glesnes's header is off-target for Philadelphia.
In the minute 3, Jon Freemon awards Cincinnati a goal kick.
Jon Freemon signals a free kick to Cincinnati in their own half.
Free kick Cincinnati.
In the minute 6, Jon Freemon signals a free kick to Philadelphia.
Can Cincinnati capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Philadelphia's half?
Goal kick for Philadelphia at Subaru Park.
In the minute 8, Philadelphia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Cincinnati's Yuya Kubo breaks free at Subaru Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Chester.
Jakob Glesnes returns to the field for Philadelphia after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 10, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Jakob Glesnes.
Jon Freemon awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 13, Cincinnati awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Philadelphia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cincinnati's half?
Cincinnati are caught offside.
In the minute 14, Cincinnati have a goal kick.
Free kick for Philadelphia in the half of Cincinnati.
Jon Freemon awards Philadelphia a goal kick.
In the minute 17, Goal kick for Cincinnati at Subaru Park.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Olivier Mbaizo for Philadelphia drives towards goal at Subaru Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 19, Corner awarded to Philadelphia.
Philadelphia's Sergio Santos attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Cincinnati goal kick.
In the minute 20, Jon Freemon signals a free kick to Cincinnati in their own half.
Jon Freemon signals a Philadelphia throw-in in Cincinnati's half.
Philadelphia have been awarded a corner by Jon Freemon.
In the minute 24, Throw-in Cincinnati.
In Chester Philadelphia drive forward through Anthony Fontana. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Philadelphia are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 27, Philadelphia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Attention is being given to Cincinnati’s Greg Garza and play has been suspended briefly.
It seems as if Greg Garza is unable to continue. Zico Bailey replaces him for the away team.
In the minute 30, Ball safe as Cincinnati is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Philadelphia in their own half.
Anthony Fontana (Philadelphia) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 32, In Chester a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Cincinnati to take a throw-in in Philadelphia territory.
Corner awarded to Cincinnati.
In the minute 35, Philadelphia attack but Brendan Aaronson's header doesn't find the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Chester.
Throw-in for Philadelphia at Subaru Park.
In the minute 38, Throw-in Philadelphia.
Philadelphia have been awarded a corner by Jon Freemon.
Sergio Santos (Philadelphia) gets in a shot – but hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
In the minute 39, Anthony Fontana for Philadelphia gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Jon Freemon awards Cincinnati a goal kick.
Free kick for Cincinnati in their own half.
In the minute 40, Alejandro Bedoya (Philadelphia) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Jon Freemon awards the away team a throw-in.
Jon Freemon signals a free kick to Cincinnati in their own half.
Philadelphia advance rapidly upfield but Jon Freemon blows for offside.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Philadelphia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Joseph-Claude Gyau gets his shot on target but fails to score for Cincinnati.
Corner awarded to Cincinnati.
In the minute 45, Philadelphia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Philadelphia in the half of Cincinnati.
The first half has been concluded at Subaru Park.
In the minute 45, Play has been interrupted briefly in Chester to check on Haris Medunjanin, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Cincinnati awarded a free kick in their own half.
The home team have replaced Jakob Glesnes with Jack Elliott. This is the second substitution made today by Jim Curtin.
In the minute 47, Cincinnati's Haris Medunjanin is back in action after a slight knock.
Free kick for Philadelphia in their own half.
Throw-in for Cincinnati in their own half.
In the minute 49, Jon Freemon signals a free kick to Cincinnati in their own half.
Philadelphia have been awarded a corner by Jon Freemon.
Jack Elliott (Philadelphia) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 51, Important block from the Philadelphia defence as Jurgen Locadia fires in a strike for Cincinnati.
Corner awarded to Cincinnati.
Jon Freemon signals a free kick to Cincinnati in their own half.
In the minute 53, Philadelphia make their first substitution with Ilsinho replacing Anthony Fontana.
Cincinnati have been awarded a corner by Jon Freemon.
Corner awarded to Philadelphia.
In the minute 56, Philadelphia drive upfield and Ilsinho gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Cincinnati defender.
Philadelphia have been awarded a corner by Jon Freemon.
In Chester, Brendan Aaronson of Philadelphia is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 57, Corner awarded to Philadelphia.
Philadelphia have been awarded a corner by Jon Freemon.
Throw-in high up the field for Philadelphia in Chester.
In the minute 59, Goal! Philadelphia have got their heads in front thanks to a Ilsinho strike.
Joseph-Claude Gyau of Cincinnati gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Philadelphia goal kick.
In the minute 62, Ball safe as Philadelphia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 63, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Cincinnati awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kamohelo Mokotjo is on a sub for Allan Cruz for Cincinnati.
Jaap Stam is making the team's second substitution at Subaru Park with Alvaro Barreal replacing Frankie Amaya.
Throw-in for Cincinnati at Subaru Park.
In the minute 64, Throw-in Cincinnati.
Jon Freemon signals a Cincinnati throw-in in Philadelphia's half.
Cincinnati awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Cincinnati get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Philadelphia's half?
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Cincinnati close to the penalty box.
In the minute 66, Philadelphia's Mark McKenzie has been booked in Chester.
In the minute 67, Cincinnati pushes forward through Haris Medunjanin, whose finish on goal is saved.
Cincinnati to take a throw-in in Philadelphia territory.
Throw-in for Cincinnati in the half of Philadelphia.
In the minute 69, Free kick for Philadelphia in their own half.
Cincinnati are coming forward and Yuya Kubo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Philadelphia have a goal kick.
In the minute 71, Free kick for Cincinnati in the half of Philadelphia.
Alvaro Barreal (Cincinnati) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Free kick Cincinnati.
In the minute 73, Great finish from Alejandro Bedoya to give Philadelphia a 2-0 lead.
Brendan Aaronson with an assist there.
Goal kick for Philadelphia at Subaru Park.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 76, Jaap Stam (Cincinnati) is making a fourth substitution, with Brandon Vazquez replacing Jurgen Locadia.
Throw-in for Philadelphia close to the penalty box.
In the minute 77, In Chester a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Philadelphia's Warren Creavalle misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Chester.
Can Philadelphia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cincinnati's half?
In the minute 78, Warren Creavalle is replacing Sergio Santos for the home team.
Can Philadelphia capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 80, Philadelphia move into a more comfortable 3-0 lead. Jack Elliott is the scorer with a header!
Jamiro Monteiro instrumental with a fine assist.
Jon Freemon signals a free kick to Philadelphia.
In the minute 82, Cincinnati have a goal kick.
Jon Freemon signals a free kick to Philadelphia.
The home team replace Alejandro Bedoya with Andrew Wooten.
Philadelphia to take a throw-in in Cincinnati territory.
Free kick for Cincinnati in their own half.
In the minute 85, Matt Real is replacing Kai Wagner for Philadelphia at Subaru Park.
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Cincinnati in the half of Philadelphia.
Corner awarded to Philadelphia.
Philadelphia's Kacper Przybylko gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Cincinnati defender.
In the minute 89, Philadelphia have been awarded a corner by Jon Freemon.
Jon Freemon awards the away team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Cincinnati.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Jon Freemon signals a free kick to Cincinnati just outside Philadelphia's area.
In Chester Cincinnati attack through Maikel Van der Werff. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Philadelphia at Subaru Park.
It's 3-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
Olivier Mbaizo for Philadelphia has been booked by Jon Freemon and receives a first yellow card.
